Value.description:
This is an extended and configurable colour picker, that lets you to select a colour from the standard picker or from a list of HTML names, then format and insert it to the cursor position.
Moreover, ColorCoder dialog can remain openend and always visible if you wish, so that you could add more colours in a row while editing your document.
